text:
Created attachment 27121
Proposed patch

Hi,

here is a patch that merges some adjacent calls to 'ap_rputs'.
creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
i.galic@brainsware.org
text: I just realized this has been filed against trunk, so I'm closing the issue.

creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
text:
In fact, r1131465 was about inlining 'ap_rputs'.

The attached patch is for merging several calls to 'ap_rputs' into one.


Both ideas (inlining and merging calls when appropriate) were described here :
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/httpd-dev/201105.mbox/%3Cis0sae$i4k$1@dough.gmane.org%3E

For me this patch is definitively something different than r1131465.
